mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE( NBNUM, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, ENDDATE )VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(NBNUM), 0)+1 FROM NOTICE ), #{title}, #{cont}, #{writer}, SYSDATE + #{enddate} )
mapper.select: SELECT NBNUM,TITLE,CONT,WRITER,TO_CHAR(REGDATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') REGDATE, READCOUNT, TO_CHAR(ENDDATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') AS ENDDATE FROM ( SELECT NBNUM,TITLE,CONT,WRITER,REGDATE,READCOUNT,ENDDATE,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NBNUM) AS RNUM FROM NOTICE WHERE ENDDATE > SYSDATE ) NOTI WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY ENDDATE DESC
SELECT NBNUM ,TITLE ,CONT ,WRITER ,TO_CHAR(REGDATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') REGDATE ,READCOUNT ,TO_CHAR(ENDDATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일"') AS ENDDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NBNUM = #{nbnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET READCOUNT = READCOUNT + 1 WHERE NBNUM = #{ nbnum }
